description:
## Post On Screen Pro - Display texts and images on top of your screens

![Screenshot of Post On Screen Pro](https://www.japplis.com/post-on-screen/pro/images/post-on-screen-pro-screenshot.png)

Display text on top of your other windows. 
        Select the text, font, size, color or gradient.
        Define color, gradient, size of the text outline.
        Possibility to define multiple text using the '|' separator and using the left/right keys to change the text.
        Define the speed to rotate the gradient colors.
        Define the transparency of the text and image.
        It can also be used to show the current time and date.
        
        Shareware: Fully functional for one day, then limited features.
summary: Display texts and images on top of your screens
author: Japplis
